ygData.subject: Listen, here. Listen well.
ygData.msgSnippet: I do know something. I took all my knowledge, everything I know, used all the common sense I have, and was able to talk my way into a clue from a person that
ygData.messageBody:
I do know something. I took all my knowledge, everything I know, used all
the common sense I have, and was able to talk my way into a clue from a
person that knows all about the fishing poles. At first I thought whoever
knew about it was selfish, that they had no right to keep this, but then
when I found out that this group of people worked hard for what they had
found, and are very secrective about it, don't deserve their secret to be
given away. I mean, THEY are the ones that found the secret, and yes it is a
secret, so why is it that they should just go off and tell everyone? This
game is all about exploration and finding things, and having fun. Thats what
they did, and they found something, so why shouldn't you have to do the same
thing that they did? Why should you just sit back and happily profit from
all thier work? This group, whom is a very secretive group, whom I shall not
name, worked hard to get what they know, and so I'm not going to go giving
away the clue I was told, especially after the rude, immature, derogatory
comments that were made about me. I will tell you this though. Waste not a
plat more on trying combinations. You are not only wasting your money, but
you are wasting your time. Search the world, high and low, search the world
above and below...
This is all I will say. It's been nice being part of this list. I though you
were a bunch of decent people. Your coments have changed my mind. I will no
longer be a part of this list as you wish. It's been fun guys, and thanks
for all the fish.

Sniffledoo Copperheart 18th Common Squire of The Scarlet Blade
